project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV Files
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file, focusing on calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns specified by the user.

task.name: Implement functionality to read a CSV file.
Extract numerical columns specified by the user.
Calculate the mean for the extracted numerical columns.
Calculate the median for the extracted numerical columns.
Calculate the mode for the extracted numerical columns.
Display the results (mean, median, and mode) to the user.
Write tests for each of the implemented analysis features.
Execute tests on the implemented features to ensure accuracy and functionality.
